tools

类 SampleHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.SampleHelper

  • public class SampleHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    extend image samples by random crop
    jpgs and pngs only

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  SampleHelper.ImgProcessor
      Must implements public BufferedImage process(BufferedImage img);
      usage: just like FilenameFilter
      String[] myFiles = directory.list(new FilenameFilter() {
      public boolean accept(File directory, String fileName) {
      return fileName.endsWith(".txt");
      }
      });

      SampleHelper()

      Copy the entire structure of inputDir to outputDir/inputDirName with images processed by processor inside.

      Print paths to images that does not meet any of the requirements Note:recursive

      Extends the number of examples by random cropping.

      copy dir structure and images in inputDir, and output resized images to outputDir/inputDirname/ in corresponding structure.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SampleHelper

        public SampleHelper()

    • 方法详细资料

      • extendSamples

        public static void extendSamples(java.lang.String directoryPath)
        Extends the number of examples by random cropping.
        crop portion is specified by TFUtils.cropRate
        new images saved in the same dir but with new names starting with "ext-"
        Note: not recursive
        参数:
        directoryPath -

      • batchEditImages

        public static void batchEditImages(java.lang.String inputDir,
                                   java.lang.String outputDir,
                                   java.lang.String prefix,
                                   SampleHelper.ImgProcessor processor)
        Copy the entire structure of inputDir to outputDir/inputDirName with images processed by processor inside.
        Note:recursive
        参数:
        inputDir -
        outputDir -
        prefix - rename images with "prefix"+randInt
        processor - outputImg = processor.process(inputImg);

      • scaleImageDir

        public static void scaleImageDir(java.lang.String inputDir,
                                 java.lang.String outputDir,
                                 int maxSize)
        copy dir structure and images in inputDir, and output resized images to outputDir/inputDirname/ in corresponding structure. rename images with "scale-"+randInt
        Note:recursive
        参数:
        inputDir -
        outputDir -
        maxSize - max size of the output image, whose all sides are less than or equal to maxSize

      • checkDimensionsRec

        public static void checkDimensionsRec(java.io.File rootDir,
                                      int minW,
                                      int minH,
                                      int maxW,
                                      int maxH,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> divs,
                                      java.lang.String outputDir)
        Print paths to images that does not meet any of the requirements Note:recursive
        参数:
        rootDir - div to be checked
        minW -
        minH -
        maxW - if maxW<=0, it is ignored
        maxH - if maxH<=0, it is ignored
        divs - if not null, paths to the unqualified images are stored there
        outputDir - if not null, unqualified images are moved to this dir

      • generateTrainAndEvalSets

        public static void generateTrainAndEvalSets(java.lang.String rootPath,
                                            double percentForEval)
        generate randomly selected files for training and evaluation from a processed dataset Note:recursive
        参数:
        rootPath - create folders "train" and "eval" under the root dir and keep the structure of the root dir inside these new dirs.
        percentForEval - with a probability of percentForEval/1, files in the root dir are copied to the eval dir, the rest are copied to the train dir

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
